description: Sets Kaggle API credentials from SQL.
comment: Alternatively use env vars or `~/.kaggle/kaggle.json`. Returns true on success.

description: Downloads a Kaggle dataset to the local cache directory and returns the local dataset path.
Searches Kaggle datasets and returns a JSON array.
Returns metadata for a dataset as JSON.

comment: Includes path, size_mb, limit_mb, usage_percent, is_soft_limit, and type fields.

description: Manually enforces cache size limit using LRU eviction.
comment: Returns true on success. (Automatic with soft limit by default).

description: Checks if cached dataset is the latest version from Kaggle.
comment: Returns false if not cached or outdated.

description: Forces update to latest version (ignores cache).
comment: Returns local path to freshly downloaded dataset.

description: Expands a JSON object into newline-delimited JSON rows.
comment: Fields: key, value, type, path. Users normally shouldn't need to use this function.

description: Resolves a specific file's local path inside a downloaded dataset.
comment: Will retrieve (and cache if not downloaded already).

description: Lists files (non-recursively) in the dataset's local directory.
